new_posts.title: What‚Äôs new with GitHub Copilot coding agent
new_posts.summary:
GitHub Copilot coding agent now includes a model picker, self-review, built-in security scanning, custom agents, and CLI handoff. Here's what's new and how to use it.

new_posts.title: Claude and Codex now available for Copilot Business & Pro users

new_posts.title: macos-26 is now generally available for GitHub-hosted runners
new_posts.summary: The macOS 26 runner image is now generally available for GitHub Actions. Previously in public preview, macOS 26 runners give you a fully supported environment for building and testing apps…</

new_posts.summary: GPT-5.3-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+. You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHu
